Articles.Content: Link to imgur album here: http://imgur.com/a/vK7fo

Well done, I cant believe it  I have only just watched the 1969 animation from nassa and was thinking this it what I'd like to  copy nassa's history of space, I was about to post here has anyone else tried the Apollo mission.  as a newbie 2weeks in, I cant believe you mastered it fantastic, there must have been a lot of accidents making this all work, and the ship looks so stream line as well, hats of to you man.

Hi having watched your pic's again (Apollo mun mission)  what do you mean by not using Mechjeb is this a mod??

Regards Brian
